subject: Purchasing 5 sets of Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal
description_text:
Hello,

I am interested in purchasing 5pc SIMSONN Pedals from your store - 
https://www.simsonn.com/

As far as I can see I cannot change the currency to Euro for a purchase 
to Bulgaria?

Where do you ship from for Bulgaria?

Before I place my order, can you confirm if you can provide a commercial 
VAT invoice after purchase?

I need this invoice for business purposes and VAT refund in Bulgaria.

The invoice should include:
- Your company details (name, address, German VAT number)
- My company details
- Product description and price
- VAT amount shown separately
- Proper invoice number and date

Can you issue such invoices for your customers? Can you share with me an 
example of such an invoice so I can ask my accountant if it is good?

Thank you for your confirmation.

Best regards,

-- 

Иван Марков

Управител на ApexVR

Телефон: +359888562731 <tel:+359888562731>

conversations.body_text: Hello, we currently do not accept payments in euros, but you should be able to make payments in euros. The system will convert the amount to USD based on the exchange rate. We will provide the corresponding order invoice, and we will ship from our German warehouse to Bulgaria.

Hello,

Thank you for the response. Do you offer a discount for businesses for a 
bundle purchase? We are in phase one of our sim club and we are going to 
need 5 sets of black pedals + 5 sets of VAM rumble motors. Also can you 
please send me an example of how your order invoice will look like 
because I need to verify with my accountant that it is going to work for 
a VAT return in Bulgaria. Or maybe some pro-form invoice.

Best regards,
Ivan Markov
Hi Иван Марков,    You may refer to this invoice. If there are any other requirements, we can add them for you.

Hello,

Thank you, I've passed the invoice to my accountant. I saw that you are

Best regards,
Ivan Markov

Ivan Markov

Hello, this is our German VAT number: 368879693  For orders exceeding 150 euros, we do not charge taxes upfront. These are typically collected by customs along with any applicable duties. However, since we ship from Germany, no customs duties or VAT charges apply.

Hi Иван Марков,    We apologize for the delayed response.  Our pricing does not include VAT, so we are unable to issue invoices with a German VAT number.     However, if you require an invoice, we can charge you 19% VAT at checkout and provide a legally compliant invoice containing full order details (including product names, quantities, and total amount) for your records.     Thank you for your understanding.     Sincerely,  The Simsonn Team

Thank you for the clarification.

This is a B2B intra‑EU supply of goods from Germany to Bulgaria. As an 
EU VAT‑registered business customer, we provide our valid Bulgarian VAT 
ID (BG208480539). Under EU VAT rules and German UStG, such cross‑border 
B2B supplies are invoiced without German VAT and subject to reverse 
charge in the Member State of destination.

Please issue a net invoice without VAT, including:

Your German VAT ID and our Bulgarian VAT ID

A reverse charge note, e.g. “Steuerschuldnerschaft des 
Leistungsempfängers (§13b UStG)﻿
” or “Reverse charge – intra‑Community supply (Article 138 VAT Directive)”

All mandatory invoice items (supplier and customer name/address, invoice 
number, date, description, quantities, net amounts)

We will account for VAT in Bulgaria as an intra‑Community acquisition.

If needed, please consult your tax advisor: for cross‑border B2B 
supplies within the EU, VAT is not charged by the supplier in Germany; 
the tax liability shifts to the customer (Section 13b UStG / Article 196 
VAT Directive).
